meanings: (한쪽으로 밀리다) be cornered, be driven[pushed] (into a corner)
(한곳으로 모이다) flock, throng, (업무 등이) be swamped with[by]

meanings.meaning: driven to the verge of bankruptcy

vlive.korean: 어디 사람이 몰려서 나는 C, D! Where people will crowd... C and D! 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : [Wink Arcade] 박지훈 감자 획득 도전기 Lv.20
vlive.english: Where people will crowd... C and D!

vlive.korean: 내가 이거는 눈이 몰려서... My eyes were very close together. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 차 한잔..더?🍵😚
vlive.english: My eyes were very close together.

vlive.korean: 이제 사람이 너무 몰려서 저희가... 미안해요. And there's a lot of people here. I'm sorry. 듣기 View video UP10TION : COMEBACK! 무대 '하얗게 불태웠어' 터져라 LTE!
vlive.english: And there's a lot of people here. I'm sorry.

vlive.korean: 이게 갑자기 순간적으로 몰려서 그런가 보다. It must be because the comments are flooding in at once. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Replay]완벽한 아내 X 앞터V(Ms.Perfect X Early Interview)
vlive.english: It must be because the comments are flooding in at once.

vlive.korean: 사람들이 너무 몰려서 다칠까봐 걱정되는데요. I'm a bit afraid if anyone got injured as it's too crowded. 듣기 View video DIA : 다이아는 지금 부산2
vlive.english: I'm a bit afraid if anyone got injured as it's too crowded.

examples.korean: Yesterday, I got suddenly swamped with work so I had to work overtime. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어제 갑자기 일이 몰려서 야근을 해야 했다 Neungyule
examples.english: Yesterday, I got suddenly swamped with work so I had to work overtime. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The soldiers huddled together around the fire, hoping that the heavy snow and fierce winds would soon subside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 병사들은 불 주변에 떼지어 몰려서, 폭설과 강풍이 곧 잠잠해지기를 바랐다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
